name: Seven Roads (DL002)
description:
This is the second album from Strike The Colours, due for release on the 28th September 2009. Recorded last year at Chemikal Underground's Chem 19 Studios with Paul Savage. Here's what some people are saying about it!


 "Jenny Reeve's soulful delivery and cutting directness shine bright....could stop you in your tracks" The Skinny

  " A collection of simple but effective pop tunes flecked through with folk and displaying assured songwriting prowess. Quality Stuff"
 The List Magazine



 COLD HANDS
 BREATHING EXERCISE
 SAFETY IN NUMBERS
 THE THINGS I CAN'T EXPLAIN
 IF I DON'T BELONG
 CAT
 TRAIN OF THOUGHT
 WOODLAND
 POSTCARDS
 RIVERS

options.name: The Face That Sunk A Thousand Ships

name: The Face That Sunk A Thousand Ships (DL 001)
description:
Released in 2007, this is the first mini-album by Strike The Colours. Recorded at various locations in Glasgow, Scotland (including Jenny's house!) it features 6 songs. Here is what some people said about it:

"Every moment of this six-track mini-album is a captivating saunter into a world of soul-pondering organic songwriting. Impossible not to be knocked out by it" The Skinny

"Subtle and expertly crafted..Reve's confident songs showcasing her delectable voice and skills with both violin and guitar"


 CHOOSE ME
 BARE LEGS IN A STORM
 SAFETY IN NUMBERS
 30 MILES AN HOUR
 YOUNG UPSTART
 WE DREAMED OF STARS
